name.title: Name
name.description:
The name of this object.

This will be used in the following places:
- how you refer to this object in Python/YAML/CLI
- log message
- ...

When not given, then the default naming strategy will apply.

log_config.title: Log Config
log_config.description: The YAML config of the logger used in this object.

show_exc_info.title: Show Exc Info
show_exc_info.description: If set, then exception stack information to be added to the logging message, useful in debugging

uses.title: Uses
uses.description: The YAML file represents a flow

inspect.title: Inspect
inspect.description:
The strategy on those inspect pods in the flow.

If `REMOVE` is given then all inspect pods are removed when building the flow.
